title: In-Context Learning Workshop for Software Engineering Knowledge Reasoning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A course designed for professionals in medical, legal, or technical fields to apply software knowledge reasoning skills in practice

learning_goals: Explain the FQN (Fully Qualified Names) inference method using pre-trained code models (PCM)

Propose practical applications of PCM-based knowledge retrieval strategies across diverse domains
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
